title: JOINT STATEMENT BY THE WORKING PROFESSIONALS AND TRADE UNION MEMBERS IN SRI LANKA
content: 15 MARCH 2012 Your  Excellency, It is regrettable that a section of the international community led by the United States of America,  United Kingdom, and the European Union have initiated a national sovereignty eroding resolution against Sri Lanka during the current Nineteenth session of the Human Rights Council at the United Nations in Geneva….
